thread.title: BRIEF-CalPERS Urges Shareowners Of Pilgrims Pride To Support Proposal Regarding Board Diversity

title: BRIEF-CalPERS Urges Shareowners Of Pilgrims Pride To Support Proposal Regarding Board Diversity

organizations.name: support proposal regarding board diversity reuters staff

text:
April 20, 2018 / 7:54 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-CalPERS Urges Shareowners Of Pilgrims Pride To Support Proposal Regarding Board Diversity Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - California Public Employees Retirement System: 
* CALPERS URGES SHAREOWNERS OF PILGRIMS PRIDE TO SUPPORT PROPOSAL #6 REGARDING BOARD DIVERSITY FILED BY OXFAM AMERICA AT PILGRIM'S MAY 10 AGM - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2vx7tzt ) Further company coverage:
